p:
The mass of PEDOT ( m) was calculated from the total charge of the film after polymerization process, using the amount of charge ( Q dep1), and assuming 100% current efficiency ( η) (the total charge passed through the cell during the polymer film growth process). M 1 is the molecular weight of EDOT, F is the Faraday constant (96,485 Cmol −1). Z 1 (=2 here) is the number of electrons transferred
28 . The columbic equivalent for the obtained PEDOT film was found to be 0.040109 C and the mass of PEDOT was calculated as 2.974 × 10 −5g.
